page.title: 12Industry In Blacon
page.content: Blacon itself is mainly a residential area.The larger industries lie on the{Sealand Industrial Estate. {Here there}are a variety of warehouses, factories, and other industries.There is a{hypermarket {called Kwik Save on}Sealand Road, which includes many other shops. There are also{canning}and{bottling {factories on Sealand Road}for soft drinks and beers.The Chester Corporation has a{sewage works}between the River Dee and the industrial estate and there is also a{gas-works.} There is quite a lot of{derelict land. Also there is an MFI warehouse which sells furniture of all kinds, bathroom and bedroom suites can also be bought. Because of the factories and all the smoke coming from them the area is very smelly.
